wikitext.*:
<includeonly>{{ #vardefine: ii | {{#ifeq:{{{1|desc}}}|desc|{{{upper|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}}|{{{lower|2006}}}}} }}{{
  #while:
  | {{#ifexpr:{{#ifeq:{{{1|desc}}}|desc|{{#var:ii}}>={{{lower|2006}}}|{{#var:ii}}<={{{upper|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}}}} | true }}
  |
  {{#vardefine:i|{{#var:ii}}}}{{ #vardefine: ii | {{ #expr:{{#ifeq:{{{1|desc}}}|desc|{{ #var: ii }} - 1|{{ #var: ii }} + 1 }}}} }}
{{#if:{{{{{#var:i}}|}}}|<nowiki />

;{{#var:i}}年
{{{{{#var:i}}|}}}}}
}}
{{#forargs:
| key
| val
|<nowiki />
{{#switch: {{#var:key}}
 |desc|upper|lower
 |逆序|上限|下限 = <!-- 屏蔽已存在的项目 -->
 |#default =
{{#if:{{Ifnumber|{{#var:key}}||{{#var: val}}}}|

;{{#var: key}}
{{#var: val}}
}}
}}<!-- end switch -->
}}<!-- end forargs --></includeonly><noinclude>[[Category:格式模板]]{{doc}}</noinclude>
